name: WP Socket Server
tagline: A free unlimited managed socket server
body:
### WP SOCKET SERVER These are the commands to access the WP Socket Server ## auth authenticates you with the service, without this, you cannot do much.
Inputs: emailAddress, password
Outputs:
msg:Authentication Success ## list shows your list of connections
Inputs: None
Outputs:
con:connection index;connected:description;server;port ## monitor monitor the connection of choice, automatically stop monitoring other connections
Inputs: connectionId
Outputs:
msg:Now monitoring 20 ## stopmonitoring stop monitoring the connection
Inputs: connectionId
Outputs:
msg:Could not stop monitoring 20 ## create create a connection
Inputs: server, port, serviceType
Outputs:
msg:Created 20
## connect connect a connection
Inputs: connectionId
Output:
msg:Connecting to 20
## destroy destroy a connection
Inputs: connectionId
Outputs:
msg:Destroyed 20
## disconnect disconnection a connection
Inputs: connectionId
Outputs:
msg:Disconnected from 20
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
